SA11sanss18u:216: evaṃ bodhisatvo dharmavad dharme smṛtim upasthāpayati /

SA11sanss18u:242: yena te satva mucyante sukhī bhonti a-
SA11sanss18u:250: ye câpi nirayāḥ kecid buddhakṣetreṣv acintiṣu /
SA11sanss18u:254: kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā /
SA11sanss18u:255: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te //
SA11sanss18u:256: agnimadhye yathā padmam abhūtaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet /

SA11sanss18u:264: teṣāṃ dānāni datvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te //

SA11sanss18u:272: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca //
SA11sanss18u:273: yena yenâiva câṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet /
SA11sanss18u:276: yeṣām anantā śikṣā hi anantaś câpi gocaraḥ /
SA11sanss18u:279: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇântaḥ suvaco bhaved /
SA11sanss18u:281: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:284: cūrṇavicitravikīrṇa samantān te jinapūja karonti maha-ātmā //

SA11sanss18u:294: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yathâikajinasya karonti /
SA11sanss18u:296: eṣa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ te jagasaṃgrahajñānavikurvā /
SA11sanss18u:312: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena //
SA11sanss18u:313: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena /
SA11sanss18u:314: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ //
SA11sanss18u:315: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [[DOUBT]] agrasamādhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:317: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:318: ye pariṣkāra sukhâvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:319: dātu dadanti karonti jagârthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasâgraiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:324: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:326: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī /
SA11sanss18u:328: ye catur evâśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti /
SA11sanss18u:329: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathâśaya loke //
SA11sanss18u:331: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena //
SA11sanss18u:333: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya //
SA11sanss18u:334: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:339: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānâcari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:340: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagârthaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:342: tatra jarârdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśâtmā //
SA11sanss18u:344: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti //
SA11sanss18u:346: buddhamahâtma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagârtham //
SA11sanss18u:348: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti //
SA11sanss18u:352: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti //
SA11sanss18u:353: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:356: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhontī sârthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:360: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:363: vidyabalâuṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:364: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramâgrā yatrâdhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:365: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:370: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:372: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:377: ye muṣaleśaya [[DOUBT]] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:378: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyâśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya /
SA11sanss18u:382: sūkṣmapadebhir upāyana yebhī satyaprakāśana teṣu karonti //
SA11sanss18u:391: te yathasatya niruktividhijñâivam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā /
SA11sanss18u:396: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti //
SA11sanss18u:397: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata satva vijānita raśmi /
SA11sanss18u:398: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu anuttari jñānavarasya //
SA11sanss18u:399: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharmaṃ saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām /
SA11sanss18u:400: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:402: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:403: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:404: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī /
SA11sanss18u:405: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:406: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān /
SA11sanss18u:408: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:410: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:411: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:419: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:420: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū //
SA11sanss18u:422: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:423: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:424: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:426: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā //
SA11sanss18u:429: puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:430: dānu dadanti vicitram anekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ //
SA11sanss18u:431: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:432: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:433: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:434: eka tu dharma mukhātu anekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
SA11sanss18u:436: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
SA11sanss18u:438: dharmapadârthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:439: prajñapradīpayâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:442: dharmâsvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:443: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:445: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:446: dharmânugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:447: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:450: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:451: niṣparidāha yâusari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:452: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA11sanss18u:454: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
SA11sanss18u:455: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:457: kṣāntiviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya yâkṣama codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:458: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:460: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā //
SA11sanss18u:461: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:462: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:463: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitvâkhinnaprayogāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:464: te catu mārapathâtikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhiṃ //
SA11sanss18u:465: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
SA11sanss18u:466: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tenôtaptavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:467: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:468: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:469: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
SA11sanss18u:470: varṇita dhyāna praśāntâraṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:471: prajñaviyūha yâusari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:472: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye 'smin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:478: rājyadhanâtmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:479: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:480: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:483: buddhabalâviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:484: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyâbhayârdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:486: ye 'bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:487: trāyita yaccharaṇâgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:490: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
SA11sanss18u:491: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:493: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacoditâyu kṣayānte /
SA11sanss18u:494: buddhânusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
SA11sanss18u:495: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā
SA11sanss18u:498: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇânte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:499: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:500: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:503: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:504: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:505: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
SA11sanss18u:508: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:509: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:512: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:517: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:518: ratnaviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:519: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
SA11sanss18u:520: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:521: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:522: gandhaprabhāsa yâusari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:523: ghrātvâmānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:530: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalôpama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:531: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:532: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:536: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagnâcela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:539: raśmi rasâgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasâgra labhantī /
SA11sanss18u:540: bhojana pāna vicitra rasâgrān datva rasâgravatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:541: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:543: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
SA11sanss18u:544: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:545: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
SA11sanss18u:547: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
SA11sanss18u:548: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:549: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
SA11sanss18u:550: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇôdīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:551: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna suindriya bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:552: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //citta-
SA11sanss18u:554: viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
SA11sanss18u:555: citta samādhivaśânuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:556: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarêndrān /
SA11sanss18u:558: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabdâśabdata śūnya vijānī /
SA11sanss18u:559: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:560: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
SA11sanss18u:563: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasâgrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:565: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:566: śaktitriśūlâsi [[DOUBT]] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumôtpala bhontī //
SA11sanss18u:567: duṣyâneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:570: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
SA11sanss18u:573: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:574: raśmi sukhāpramukhêti kṛtvâikatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:576: te yathâikata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajôpama raśmī /
SA11sanss18u:577: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:578: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
SA11sanss18u:579: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇâiṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:580: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:581: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhôpacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:582: ye ca śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:583: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:585: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī nô ca sa nâsti udeti sa loke /
SA11sanss18u:589: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:591: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:592: te pi tu asti mahâtmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:593: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:595: yasy imu [[DOUBT]] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [[DOUBT]] prasādaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:596: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nâṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
SA11sanss18u:602: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
SA11sanss18u:603: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddhaguṇeṣu /
SA11sanss18u:604: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarvôdikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:609: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:615: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarâgraśarīrā /
SA11sanss18u:621: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
SA11sanss18u:622: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:623: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:624: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramâṇurajātaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:631: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:635: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahâtmā //
SA11sanss18u:636: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
SA11sanss18u:637: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganânusmṛtîmān //
SA11sanss18u:639: kalpâcintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
SA11sanss18u:642: te ca vaśe sthitâṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvakâika bhavībahu bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:643: bhūtva bahuḥ punâika bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
SA11sanss18u:644: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi anarthiku lokôpekṣī /
SA11sanss18u:645: darśayi kāyavikurvâcintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitâiṣī //
SA11sanss18u:646: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:651: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:653: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
SA11sanss18u:654: teṣu svarâṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
SA11sanss18u:655: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
SA11sanss18u:656: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
SA11sanss18u:657: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitrânantān /
SA11sanss18u:659: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:660: dhyānâbhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:661: rāhu yathêṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:662: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:663: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayîdṛśa ṛddhī /
SA11sanss18u:664: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā //
SA11sanss18u:666: yātuka bimbaranekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
SA11sanss18u:668: sarvasurêndrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svâyum /
SA11sanss18u:669: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurêndrāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:670: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:671: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurêndrāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:673: sarvajagasyâśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī // ...
SA11sanss18u:674: vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
SA11sanss18u:675: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhâvaha sarvajagasya //
SA11sanss18u:676: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
SA11sanss18u:677: darśayi lokavipākâcintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
